content: **crocheted hat in drops paris the piece is worked in the round top down with lace pattern sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-906 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-150 g colour 72 parrot green **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
